PARAGRAPH.STRING: ([IPA: məˈlɑːwi] or [IPA: [malaβi]]; formerly Nyasaland) is a democratic, densely populated country located in southeastern Africa.
has Zambia to the north-west, Tanzania to the north, and Mozambique surrounding

on the east, south, and west. The origin of the name Malawi remains unclear; it is held to be either derived from that of southern tribes, or noting the "glitter of the sun rising across the lake" (as seen in
